text:
I'll ask briefly, but we have about 10 minutes
to do something, right? ...Is that the situation?

Alright then, let's do something.
--Right now, where's the "treasure"...?

The mission at the stadium stage...
"Let's make a shining live performance a success!"

We have no choice but to bet on the reward
for clearing this!

...
Everyone, great job getting this far!!

You've all worked so hard until today, right?
I hope the audience enjoys themselves.

Yeah! It's a huge success...
The whole school was filled with smiles...!

I want to keep enjoying high school life
with everyone like this! But...
Instead, I'll leave a song here.

When you feel happy, or when you feel sad,
when you want to touch someone, reach out.

I'll reach out to that hand...
And I won't let go.

I'm cheering for you.
Always, always... with all my heart!
